gameMaster

Interface GameManagerObservor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameMaster

    public interface GameManagerObservor
    Interface created to have interactions between game manager and game master

    • Method Detail

      • updateDisplay

        void updateDisplay()
        Game master that display can be updated

      • mouseClicked

        void mouseClicked(int x,
                  int y)
        To tell game master that mouse is clicked
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate where mouse was clicked
        y - y coordinate where mouse was clicked

      • handleKeyEvent

        void handleKeyEvent(char key)
        Inform the GameMaster that the key 'key' was pressed, and handle it appropriately. 'a' and 'd' turn right and left, 'w' moves a tile forward, and 'n' moves to the next Player's turn.
        Parameters:
        key - the letter which was pressed

      • updateTileAfterMove

        void updateTileAfterMove(Unit currUnit)
        Update the tile from which the Unit currUnit is moving
        Parameters:
        currUnit - Unit whose tiles needs to be updated

      • endTurn

        void endTurn()
        End the turn of the current player and move to the next turn

        Move for a robot

      • forthTurnFromAI

      • forthScan

        int forthScan(Position p,
              int range)
        Scan for the Unit at Position 'p' which has range 'range.
        Parameters:
        p - Position of the unit scanning
        range - range of the unit scanning
        Returns:
        the number of robots scanned

      • forthScannedUnits

        java.util.ArrayList<Unit> forthScannedUnits(Unit myUnit)
        Get a list of the Units who are in visible range of the Unit 'myUnit'
        Parameters:
        myUnit - That performs scan
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Unit all the scanned units

      • forthIdentify

        IdentifyClass forthIdentify(Unit myUnit,
                            Unit myTarget)
        Tells game master to perform identify on the unit
        Parameters:
        myUnit - Unit performing the Identify
        myTarget - Unit on which identify was performed
        Returns:
        Information related to identify

      • forthShoot

        void forthShoot(int range,
                int dir,
                Unit unit)
        tells game master, to perform a shoot
        Parameters:
        range - range of the target unit i placed on
        dir - direction where target unit is facing
        unit - unit on which to attack

      • mouseMoved

        void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Check for a Unit over the tile
        Parameters:

      • forthCheck

        java.lang.String forthCheck(Unit unit,
                            int checkDirection)
        Check the contents of the tile in direction 'checkDirection' from Unit 'unit.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit checking.
        checkDirection - The direction to check in.
        Returns:
        Details regarding the contents of the checked tile.

      • sendMessage

        boolean sendMessage(ForthString destType,
                    Value payLoad)
        Send a message consisting of the value 'payLoad' from the current Unit to the Unit on the current Unit's team of type destType.
        Parameters:
        destType - The type of the Unit for which the message is destined.
        payLoad - The value of the message
        Returns:
        true if the message was sent successfully, false otherwise.
